column1: Drug Discovery and Pharma Management MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis MSc was introduced as a spin-off from the MSc Drug Discovery in response to the increasing opportunities which now exist for research scientists who can evaluate the business potential of their science as well as generate the science itself. The changing landscape of the Pharma world has increased the need for scientists with business knowledge.About this degreeThis MSc combines a full overview of the whole drug discovery and development process with the addition of a core module in pharma management and business development skills.
